item.title: Describe a Location
item.description: We can use three types of properties to describe a location1: Site details (is there a ramp? is it on the wrong side of the road?); Accessibility; Socioeconomic environment. The three types of properties of a location. The site details and the socioeconomic environment is understood by the name. Here we will discuss the accessibility of a location. Accessibility of a location Accessibility is a very important property of a location.
